moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Water Sport
moves.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Mud Bomb
moves.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Magnitude
moves.description: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone around the user. Its power varies.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

moves.name: Snore
moves.description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Aqua Tail
moves.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target instantly faints if it hits.
